channel.title: HsPS.in - A personal web page of Harisankar P S
channel.description: Recent content on HsPS.in - A personal web page of Harisankar P S

item.description: Harisankar P S Simple but Jada [1] is a motto that came into my vocabulary during my college days. I try to do justice to that phrase in the work, products, business, journeys and memories I build, create or be part of. Reference [1] Jada : how we say colloquially awesome in malayalam
